W

Warrior - Class in perso
Class representing warrior in the game A warrior is defined by this informations : name : picture URL : life level : attack strength : attack tool : defense tool : square board position : A warrior can have actions such as : welcome display informations
Warrior() - Constructor for class perso.Warrior
Default warrior constructor.
Warrior(String) - Constructor for class perso.Warrior
Name customized warrior constructor.
Warrior(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class perso.Warrior
Customized warrior constructor.
Weapon - Class in tool
Class representing weapon, only for Warrior.
Weapon() - Constructor for class tool.Weapon
 
Weapon(String, int) - Constructor for class tool.Weapon
 
welcome() - Method in class perso.Perso
Welcome the perso.
Wizard - Class in perso
Class representing wizard in the game A wizard is defined by this informations : name : picture URL : life level : attack strength : attack tool : defense tool : square board position : A wizard can have actions such as : welcome display informations
Wizard() - Constructor for class perso.Wizard
Default wizard constructor.
Wizard(String) - Constructor for class perso.Wizard
Name customized wizard constructor.
Wizard(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class perso.Wizard
Customized warrior constructor.
